subject: Basketball
Police Brutality, Misconduct and Shootings
Demonstrations, Protests and Riots
lead_paragraph: With his choice of T-shirt, James paid tribute to the last words of Eric Garner, an unarmed black man killed in July in a confrontation with the police.
snippet: With his choice of T-shirt, James paid tribute to the last words of Eric Garner, an unarmed black man killed in July in a confrontation with the police.
